Message:
As time went on,
my name and reputation as
a witch became infamous.

Because of that,
there have been countless
attempts on my life,
but I hold no regrets.

After all, I live so
my family can too.

One day, after taking
a number of days to
complete a big job,
I finally came home.

The job was dangerous,
but it paid a great
deal of money.

We’ll be able to have
warm food for a good while.
Everyone’ll be so happy.

As I approach my friends,
they gather around me.

A sharp pain shoots
into my back.

I turn my head to find
a blade thrust into me,
and a friend holding the hilt.
